dict.string: We need access to your location to provide location-based features such as finding nearby places and enhancing your experience.
We require full access to your calendar to help you schedule and manage events seamlessly within the app.
We need permission to add events to your calendar so you can keep track of important dates directly from our app.
We need access to your calendar to help you schedule and keep track of upcoming dates and events with your matches.
We need access to your photo library so you can upload and share images within the app.
We need permission to save photos to your library when you download or edit images using the app.
We use your location to help you find potential matches nearby. For example, we show profiles of people who are close to your current location.
We use your location to keep your nearby matches updated even when the app is in the background. For example, your profile will appear in nearby searches as you move.
We need access to your camera to allow you to take and upload photos or videos directly from the app.
